name: Resilient Management by Lara Hogan
desc: A short book full of management wisdom in a comprehensive form. Both or first time managers and managers with more experience for all levels.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
desc: Solid introduction to algorithms and datastructures. Much more reliable than random online resources when studying for coding interviews.

name: Effective Modern C++: 42 Specific Ways to Improve Your Use of C++11 and C++14
desc: Need to upgrade your C++ knowledge from back in the days to modern C++? A lot of topics are conform with the Chromium C++ Styleguide - and explain why it is good practise.

name: Computer Systems: A Programmer's Perspective
desc: Really goes into the details: processor architecture, memory hierarchy, system-level I/O, concurrent programming, and many more. A must read if you want a deeper understanding of computer systems.

name: Compilers: Principles, Techniques, and Tools (2nd Edition)
desc: Dragon Book. If you want to learn the fundamentals about compilers, this is the book to read.
